segment.source: How to Cancel Loading of Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Cancel Loading of Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: How to Cancel Loading of Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Cancel Loading of Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: How to Cancel Loading of Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Cancel Loading of Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: From the desktop notification area, you can cancel the loading of applications into the cache.
segment.target: From the desktop notification area, you can cancel the loading of applications into the cache.

segment.source: Applications are loaded one application at a time; the progress bar shows you the application name, the percentage of application loaded, and the number of applications already processed compared to the total number of the applications queued.
segment.target: Applications are loaded one application at a time; the progress bar shows you the application name, the percentage of application loaded, and the number of applications already processed compared to the total number of the applications queued.

segment.source: You can cancel any application load in progress before it is 100% loaded.
segment.target: You can cancel any application load in progress before it is 100% loaded.

segment.source: You can skip the loading of all remaining applications as well.
segment.target: You can skip the loading of all remaining applications as well.

segment.source: Right-click the Application Virtualization System icon in the notification area.
segment.target: Right-click the Application Virtualization System icon in the notification area.

segment.source: Select Cancel and Load All from the pop-up menu.
segment.target: Select Cancel and Load All from the pop-up menu.

segment.source: Click one of the following buttons in the Microsoft App Virt - Confirm Cancel dialog to achieve the desired results:
segment.target: Click one of the following buttons in the Microsoft App Virt - Confirm Cancel dialog to achieve the desired results:

segment.source: Skip—To skip the currently loading application.
segment.target: Skip—To skip the currently loading application.

segment.source: Skip All—To skip all remaining applications.
segment.target: Skip All—To skip all remaining applications.

segment.source: Continue—To cancel the dialog box and continue loading applications.
segment.target: Continue—To cancel the dialog box and continue loading applications.

segment.source: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management
segment.target: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management
